Subject: Returning to the CF

From: Yanshosh@...

::Prowl::

Prowl lands near the Cybertronian Fire, gently setting Iron Raptor back on 
her feet. He looks at her, smiling.

"This is our new base," he says, gesturing toward the mighty ship, "The 
Cybertronian Fire. We've fought back a few attacks, and the shields havn't 
even gone down once!"

He slides one arm around her waist, enjoying the feel of her against him. He 
was a bit damaged, his comm-link was melted to his arm, and cracks in his 
armor were slowly leaking mech fluid, but he'd be allright. He looks into 
Iron Raptor's eyes, still smiling, his optics full of his love for her.

"Kluster might be too busy right now to assign you quarters. You can use mine 
for now, I'll go find somewhere else to sleep," he starts walking to the 
Cybertronian Fire, tugging her.

"Do you need a CR chamber?" he asks her, concern in his voice.
